reason: Missing specification that every ring site is occupied by exactly one entity (particle or vacancy). λ has n parts (including one 0), giving n−1 particles + 1 vacancy on n sites. The bijection S_n(λ) ↔ particle configurations requires stating that each site has exactly one occupant, so species at sites 1,…,n form a permutation of (λ_1,…,λ_n). Without this, the identification is ambiguous.
